name: gText
overview:
gText (http://www.gtext.com.au) is an innovative platform allowing users to send a text message to multiple people in one text. gText provides individuals, businesses, non-for-profits, event managers and promoters the ability to access affordable, and immediate go-to-market solution for sending text messages to their friends, customers, employees and more using a simple and easy “One Number to Remember.”

How does it work?

It works by signing up for free via the gText website (only takes 10 secs to join). From there you immediately receive 25 credits to start with that never expire and can be used at anytime. Start creating your group, fill in the details and start inviting. You can Mobile Invite or Email Invite, it’s entirely up to you. Once you’ve invited your members they simply reply to the SMS they have received from their mobile with “gYES,” to join your group. They will receive a welcome message, their password and all they need to do is go to the website, click the sign in tab, put their mobile number, password and away they go.

With only “One Number to Remember,” all text messages that are created by each member of your group can now reply and receive from the one number 0447948398 (04479gTEXT) by typing the group name before the message. Your members will have access to the group they have joined, check out the entire thread and conversation and they even have the option of writing a message online to their group. It’s that simple!

By sponsoring a groupâ€™s communication businesses are able to raise their brandâ€™s profile with highly specific target markets. gText also has the ability to identify a groupâ€™s interests through search algorithms allowing businesses to advertise directly to consumers who are talking about their brand, product or niche. All at a radically low price.
